text: brrda phu thi di rab khamphir thanghlay cng sraththa tx sing thi rea di hı lng ma pheux yunyan sing thi mi xyu kab phwk cea theid kxn cak thi rea ca lb bıhna khxng phwk khea læw hı man klab pi xyu khang hlang khxng man hrux mi k ca sap phwk khea chen deiyw kab thi rea di sap brrda phu thithakar lameid nı wan sab ba to læa kha sang khx ngxallxhˌ nan yxm thuk ptibati tam semx
